name: Zombie Fun Rush
description:
Can you save all the survivors on this great hyper casual game?

- Drive your way through a zombie apocalypse.
- Fire your guns and kill all zombies in your path.
- Avoid post apocalypse obstacle.
- Save the survivors and collect spare parts!

Zombie Fun Rush allows you to choose your car and upgrade it.
Kill all zombies in your way, gather as many coins as you can, and upgrade your ride in this amazing game!

Features:
- Lots of zombie crowd killing fun.
- Great cars and weapons.
- Serious Road trip!
- Addictive gameplay.
